scripts.build.select: ng build --prod is-select && cd dist/is-select && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.select-tree: ng build --prod is-select-tree && cd dist/is-select-tree && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.dx-select-tree: ng build --prod is-dx-select-tree && cd dist/is-dx-select-tree && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.input-mapping: ng build --prod is-input-mapping && cd dist/is-input-mapping && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.codemirror: ng build --prod is-codemirror && cd dist/is-codemirror && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.froala: ng build --prod is-froala && cd dist/is-froala && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.core-ui: ng build --prod is-core-ui && node copy-styles.js && cd dist/is-core-ui && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.datepicker: ng build --prod is-datepicker && cd dist/is-datepicker && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.bootstrap-switch: ng build --prod is-bootstrap-switch && cd dist/is-bootstrap-switch && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.modal: ng build --prod is-modal && cd dist/is-modal && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.grid: ng build --prod is-grid && cd dist/is-grid && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.table: ng build --prod is-table && cd dist/is-table && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.timepicker: ng build --prod is-timepicker && cd dist/is-timepicker && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.cron: ng build is-cron-editor && cd dist/is-cron-editor && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.editable-textbox: ng build --prod is-editable-textbox && cd dist/is-editable-textbox && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.build.checkmap: ng build --prod is-checkmap && cd dist/is-checkmap && npm pack --quiet && cp *.tgz ../../package
scripts.publish.cdk: ng build --prod is-cdk && npm publish dist/is-cdk
